welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Serravalle Pistoiese, a charming city nestled in the heart of Tuscany. Known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this enchanting city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lucca Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peretola Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal dedicated to low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
